tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_locations; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_locations AS SELECT alc.acvl_id AS id, COALESCE(alc.parent_location, 999999999) AS parent_location, alc.acvl_name AS location_name, COALESCE(alc.country_id, 999999999) AS country_id, COALESCE(alc.country_name, 'Undefined') AS country_name, COALESCE(alc.region_id, 999999999) AS region_id, COALESCE(alc.region_name, 'Undefined') AS region_name, COALESCE(alc.zone_id, 999999999) AS zone_id, COALESCE(alc.zone_name, 'Undefined') AS zone_name, COALESCE(alc.district_id, 999999999) AS district_id, COALESCE(alc.district_name, 'Undefined') AS district_name, COALESCE(acvl.geo_code, 'Undefined') AS geo_code, COALESCE(acv.id, 999999999) AS impl_level_id, COALESCE(acv.category_value, 'Undefined') AS impl_level_name FROM amp_location_cache alc LEFT JOIN amp_category_value_location acvl ON acvl.id = alc.acvl_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.id = acvl.parent_category_value UNION ALL SELECT 999999999, 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined' ORDER BY id;
